nodes.id: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府

zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省怀化市麻阳苗族自治县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Mayang Miao Autonomous County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法，规定了国家的基本制度和根本任务。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates the country's basic systems and fundamental tasks.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省怀化市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Huaihua City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会

zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县的国家权力机关。
description.en: The organ of state power in Mayang Miao Autonomous County.

nodes.id: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党麻阳苗族自治县人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党麻阳苗族自治县人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在麻阳苗族自治县人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party organ of the Chinese Communist Party established within the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government, who was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省怀化市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The Intermediate People's Court of Huaihua City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任麻阳苗族自治县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former County Magistrate of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省怀化市下辖的自治县。
description.en: An autonomous county under the administration of Huaihua City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府

description.zh-cn: 作为麻阳苗族自治县人民政府的授权法源。
description.en: Serves as the legal source of authority for the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government.

relationships.source: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府

description.zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府的业务上级机构是怀化市人民政府。
description.en: The operational superior organization of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government is the Huaihua Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府
relationships.target: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府的组织上级机构是麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government is the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Congress.

relationships.source: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府
relationships.target: 麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府的组织上级机构是麻阳苗族自治县人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党麻阳苗族自治县人民政府党组
relationships.target: 麻阳苗族自治县人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党麻阳苗族自治县人民政府党组是中共在县政府设立的本级党组织。
description.en: The CCP Mayang Miao Autonomous County People's Government Party Group is the party organization established by the CCP at this level within the county government.

description.zh-cn: 怀化市中级法院对吴才湖受贿、贪污及巨额财产来源不明案判处其有期徒刑18年。
description.en: The Huaihua Intermediate People's Court sentenced Wu Caihu to 18 years in prison for bribery, corruption, and possessing a large amount of property from unknown sources.
